creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Double-sided, colored, wove paper card that would be distributed on its own or inserted into the leaves of a zine, and that advertises upcoming publications, an event, and/or a call for submissions; that recounts a story, memory, or opinion of the artist's; and which often includes rants or tirades on a given subject, poetry, text art, designs, and illustrations.
title: Card/Insert: THE BLAB
